mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reports of cases ruled and adjudged in the several courts of the United States, and of Pennsylvania: held at the seat of the federal government / by A.J. Dallas
United States reports
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dallas, Alexander James, 1759-1817
United States. Supreme Court.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for the reporter at the Aurora Office
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonly cited as v. 2-4 of:United States reports.
Published: Philadelphia : J. Ormond, 1799; Philadelphia : Printed for P. Byrne by Fry and Kammerer, 1807.
Includes reports of the Supreme Court of the U.S. from 1790-1800 and of other courts 1781-1806.
Continued in 1804 by: United States. Supreme Court. Reports of cases argued and adjudged in the Supreme Court of the United States.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--United States.
Law reports, digests, etc--Pennsylvania.
